resources.string: The screen basically shows the list of songs that are playing now. This screen needs to have a list view that shows all the songs as part of the playlist.The touch/click on the list item should take to the details screen/play the song using player.

This screen should show all the available songs/albums for purchase. We need to be careful on the screen load performance owing to huge data. At the same time every items should reflect the real data.
This screen shall list the singers/podcasts/albums etc based on a criterion. The list view should be customised for different categories. Owing to large data, we can use recycler view

This screen provides a search text box and on user clicking it should list down the matching results. Since its a network call we need to ensure we notify user on delay. At the same time page load performance should not be too high

In this screen we show the details of song/album/podcast. This would bea simple screen with text views and buttons for actions. Creating an UI with lot of information but still providing aesthetic experience will be chaalenge
